akka.persistence.typed.javadsl

Class ReplyEffect<Event,State>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.persistence.typed.javadsl.Effect<Event,State>
      • akka.persistence.typed.javadsl.ReplyEffect<Event,State>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EffectImpl

    public abstract class ReplyEffect<Event,State>
extends Effect<Event,State>
    PersistentBehaviorWithEnforcedReplies can be used to enforce that replies are not forgotten. Then there will be compilation errors if the returned effect isn't a ReplyEffect, which can be created with Effects().reply, Effects().noReply, Effect.thenReply, or Effect.thenNoReply.
